mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ITEM ( ITEM_ID, ORDER_ID, NAME, QUANTITY, UNIT, WEIGHT, HS_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_ITEM_ID.NEXTVAL, #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_ID AS itemId, ORDER_ID AS orderId, NAME AS name, QUANTITY AS quantity, UNIT AS unit, WEIGHT AS weight, HS_CODE AS hsCode FROM TBL_ITEM WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY ITEM_ID
